Gono Bishwabidyalay a university with a difference has been established to provide a high quality of education to meet the demands of the modern age. The objective of the Gono Bishwabidyalay is to foster the national and global development process through the creation of a centre of excellence in higher education that is responsive to societyâ€™s needs, particularly social development and human welfare. And to produce highly skilled manpower visionary leaders and enlightened citizen by imparting high quality higher education and training so that individuals can achieve their intellectual social, and personal potentials
